entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
